name: Monstergirl
description:
Game Description

Waking up late in the afternoon, Monstergirl, dissatisfied with the whole world, found a magazine with a photograph of the prince, whom she immediately fell in love with. But the palace was on the other side of the kingdom. Monstergirl decided to find the prince and make him fall in love with her.

The goal of the game is to get to the castle!

The monster is hit with a rainbow barbie. Barbie fights with a bag.

Tonque Platforms. When Barbie starts to get angry, blush and smoke comes out of her ears - the platform will now disappear.

The blue cloud begins to haunt after Barbie's first death. The cloud is a collection of Barbie's anger.

Conrol:

AD/Arrows Left, Right – Movement                                                W/Space /Arrow Up – Jump                                                                            LMB –  Fight                                                                                                    Alt F4  – Close the game window
